author: Quint Forgey
title: Pompeo defends efforts to bring Americans home amid pandemic
description: Former State Department officials, as well as members of Congress, have accused Pompeo of an insufficient response to the global coronavirus outbreak.
content: Although Pompeo said the department had "now brought over 10,000 Americans back home from places where they were stranded through no fault of their own," thousands more still trapped overseas have been forced to resort to dangerous or expensive methods of ret… [+1199 chars]
